originalText.text: We are a staging company in New York City and we have used Piano Piano's services many times to enhance our larger properties and create the wow factor that having a baby grand in a room can only accomplish. Their products are in perfect condition, the service team is outstanding, the representatives are responsive and they are a pleasure to deal with from beginning of a contract, to the end. We highly recommend them for any piano rental! Cathy Lorenz Designs 11/1/23

originalText.text: Phenomenal service! Finding the right piano for my son has been such an overwhelming process (buying new - expensive!, used - risky as you really don't know what you are getting) until I stumbled on pianopiano. After reading all the terms and reviews I decided that was the way to go for us, to rent for a year and then perhaps buy out without losing a year investment that would be made! So I placed an order on Friday afternoon,  on Saturday morning we had our brand new gorgeous piano. Simply fantastic! Thank you for providing this fabulous service and making what is such an overwhelming process so easy!

originalText.text: I haven’t visited the store but I did get my kids a gorgeous little practice piano within one week after making the decision. The process couldn’t be easier and everything happened before I expected it to. Very personal service, both the sales agent and the delivery team.  We got a little beauty of a beginners piano at a very low monthly price—which is perfect for us because there is no pressure or commitment to buy her. In a years time we will know what kind of piano we want, if any at all. I love knowing that I can send it back whenever I want and I can shop around and research for a year while still practicing on a real instrument every day. Anyways my kids love this baby piano and call her Princess already.  I would readily recommend this service to anyone wishing to try out being serious about piano ))) Thank you again team.

originalText.text: I rented from PianoPiano for 3.5 years and had a very positive experience throughout that time. They were very upfront about the contract and terms of renting and I never had any hidden fees or extra charges. The piano I rented was in EXCELLENT condition and maintained it's tone and performance throughout the rental period. They were always very responsive with services like piano tuning or when I moved mid-way through renting. Most recently when I had to move on very short notice and was deciding on the best course of action with the piano they were very helpful with providing information on buying (including applying 1 year + of payments to the total cost), continuing renting, and returning the piano. While I ultimately decided to return the piano for the moment I would absolutely utilize their services in the future or recommend them to others interested in piano rentals or purchases. I really appreciate Ian and Shalva's assistance with coordinating the return of the piano without hesitation when I was in a bind with the short notice move. Thank you!

originalText.text: I cannot say enough wonderful things about this company! Hands down some of the best customer service I think I’ve EVER received! Adam, the gentleman who helped us has gone above and beyond from start to finish! We love our piano and when my daughter dropped a bead inside he had it serviced in less than 48 hours. The whole organization is amazing but I have to say Adam made the experience unforgettable for us. He is a rare find and piano piano is lucky to have him. We are so grateful for all of his help!
